history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_pseries_unique,PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_pseries_unique,PSeries,PSeries_correct.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x)" on hypothesis of type "V -> Prop".

In environment H1 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x) K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V a_ex : V -> Prop x : posreal H0 : forall y : V, ball (a 0%nat) x y -> a_ex y Unable to unify "PSeries ?M2878 ?M2879 = ?M2880" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun x : nat => a_ex (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n zero k) (a k)) x)) n".

exceptions.tactic: apply is_pseries_plus with (la := PSeries a x) (lb := PSeries b x); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment H2 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x) H : forall (a : nat -> R) (x l : R), is_pseries a x l -> PSeries a x = l K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V a_ex : V -> Prop x : posreal H0 : forall y : V, ball (a 0%nat) x y -> a_ex y The term "a" has type "nat -> V" while it is expected to have type "nat -> R" (cannot unify "NormedModule.sort K V" and "R").

original: intros a_ex b_ex. apply PSeries_correct in a_ex. apply PSeries_correct in b_ex. apply is_pseries_unique. apply is_pseries_plus with (la := PSeries a x) (lb := PSeries b x); auto.
